flawed_nl_solution:
The total number of insects collected is 200 insects + 300 insects = <<200+300=500>>500 insects.
When the teacher divided the class into 4 groups, each group got 500 insects / 4 groups = <<500/4=152>>152 insects/group
#### 152

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 125, not 152. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
